flawed_nl_solution:
There are 7*2=<<7*2=14>>14 days in two weeks
So he played 14*4=<<14*4=56>>56 hours
That means the total length of the game is 56/0.4=<<56/0.4=140>>140 hours
So he has 140-56=<<140-56=84>>84 hours to beat the game
So it will take him 84/7=<<84/7=21>>21 days to beat the game
#### 21

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 21. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
